name: Fates Unveiled (According to Mean Spirits & Demons of the Industrial Age)
name_original: Fates Unveiled (According to Mean Spirits & Demons of the Industrial Age)
description:
During the industrial age, lives that passed through the grime & smog of the steam powered era were steered by the uncanny hand FATE dealt them. Within their hand, conflicting demons & spirits of the old & new ways were FATE's agents of destiny.

What will your future hold under their other-worldly control?

A short supernatural card battler game.

RULES
  • Choose one of the cards in your hand & beat the challenge FATE selects from its own.
  • Win all 9 hands to reveal your industrial age destiny.
TO PLAY
  • Tap/Click the cards to move to the next card in either your hand or FATE's.
  • Tap/Click FATE's challenge symbol (in the centre) to play your card.
  • Tap/Click anywhere to move on from the title, tutorial & end screens.
FEATURES
  • Different hands of cards, challenges, scores & destiny in each game
  • Character art CC0 from British Library Flickr account.
